name: Illusion (itch) (air49876)
description:
Illusion is a basic arcade style shooter though the view is inverted. You play as an individual who has found himself trapped inside a graveyard when an army of ghosts that are hostile for some reason have shown up and are trying to kill you. Armed with a weapon that banishes your task is simple, survive as long possible against this onslaught of ghosts in order to get the highest score you can. They might be easy to defeat but they don't stop coming ever and consequently it easy to be completely overwhelmed. But is something else going on here?

Key features

  • -Controls that are super simple to use
  • -As mentioned earlier enemies are super easy to defeat but they don't stop coming ever
  • -Score system that records the highest score you have gotten since you opened the game. How high can you get it?
